channel.title: Another Life LTD
channel.description: Recent content on Another Life LTD

item.title: Another Life, Another Label
item.description: Another Life LTD is a creative collective based in Chicago IL.

item.title: About
item.description: *TL;DR We’re a label / recording and production collective / loose association of bands in Chicago that have united to create and release music. We specialize in experimental sounds appropriate both on and off the dancefloor, with strong ties to punk and DIY. Artists Courtesy Beige on Beige Funish People David Beale: founder, facilitator, 1/4 of Beige on Beige, 1/1 of Funish

item.title: Releases
item.description: Future ALL001: Beige on Beige - mixtape #1 cassette ALL002: funish - designate/transformula single cassette ALL003: Courtesy - Hey (reissue) LP Past N/A
